title: 动态环绕MOD让游戏无法启动
author: legendkun

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
legendkun 发表于 2019-11-30 13:39
WARNING: coremods are present:
  TransformLoader ([动态环绕]DynamicSurroundings-1.12.2-3.6.0.2.jar ...
动态环境试图寻找一个参表为(Class, String, String)的Method findField但是没找到匹配的。
新版Forge（2847为例）里面找得到，所以先更新Forge试试

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
发报错文件
crash-report文件夹里面
